install.name: Wright Framework
install.author: Joomlashack
install.license: Commercial license - single domain use only

param.name: rebrand
param.label: Remove Branding
param.description: Our templates come with some branding. If you wish to remove it please purchase the rights to remove our branding by clicking on the link provided before disabling it here. Rebranding is handled as an honor system, we don't monitor or verify if you have purchased it, so please be respectful of our licensing terms.

param.name: style
param.label: Style
param.description: Select which of the style variations you wish to use.

param.name: logo
param.label: Logo Image
param.description: You can select your logo from the images directory after you upload the image.

param.name: logowidth
param.label: Logo Width
param.description: Select the column width for the logo, the rest of the space will be given to the newsflash module, or if you set it to full width the module will dissapear

param.name: body_font
param.label: Body Font
param.description: Select the default font face for the body

param.name: header_font
param.label: Heading Font
param.description: Select the default font face for the headers

param.name: columns
param.label: Columns
param.description: You can set the default widths and arrange the main columns. Any columns that are unused will just be hidden and the main column will be widened.

param.name: headerstyle
param.label: Logo type
param.description: Display the logo as an image or text

param.name: headline
param.label: Logo text
param.description: Header text to be displayed or SEO text for image

param.name: slogan
param.label: Slogan
param.description: Slogan text to be displayed or SEO text for image

param.name: logogridsize
param.label: Logo grid size
param.description: Size of the logo box (in grid units) if using text or graphic logo

param.name: logoheight
param.label: Logo Height
param.description: Enter your logo image height (ONLY enter numerical value)

param.name: sidecolumnwidth
param.label: Side Column Widths
param.description: Sets the width of the side columns

param.name: layoutstyle
param.label: Column Layout
param.description: Allows for different layouts of columns, the middle column will ALWAYS appear first in the source code for SEO!

param.name: headerscript
param.label: Header Script
param.description: If you need to add scripts to your header (like Google verification code, perhaps), you should enter them here.

param.name: footerscript
param.label: Footer Script
param.description: If you need to add scripts to your footer (like Google Analytics tracking code), you should enter them here.
